summary: The diff does not implement the required backend `isCallerAdmin` query. Only `project_state.json` was modified to describe/planning the change, so the core functional requirement remains unaddressed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a public backend query method `isCallerAdmin() : async Bool` in `backend/main.mo` that returns whether the `caller` is an admin according to the existing access-control state (use `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)`).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes were made to `backend/main.mo` (or any backend source files). The only modified file is `project_state.json`, which does not add the canister method needed by the frontend.
evidence: project_state.json (only file modified; no backend/main.mo changes present in diff)

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/metadata updates adding new feature request entries (AR-1/AR-2) and architectural notes in `project_state.json`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for implementing a backend Motoko query method; it does not request changes to project metadata/state files.
